Description:

Director - Richard Lester, Richard Donner

Writer - Jerry Siegel, Joe Shuster

Stars: Gene Hackman, Christopher Reeve, Margot Kidder
   

Unwittingly released from Phantom Zone imprisonment, three super-powered Planet Krypton criminals (Terence Stamp, Sarah Douglas and Jack O' Halloran) plan to enslave earth. Just when Superman (Christopher Reeve) decides to show a more romantic side to Lois Lane (Margot Kidder). Gene Hackman (as Lex Luthor) also returns from the first film and with a top supporting cast. Witty Richard Lester direction and visuals that astound and delight, Superman 2 saves the day any day you watch it!
